name: Chicken Fokkers
description: Challenge a friend to a short battle of timing & boldness! Will you hold your nerve & fly directly at your opponent, or chicken out and swerve away? This game only has 1 button & is played locally with another player, allowing you both to control your own WW1 Fokker biplane. A game lasts 5 rounds, & whichever Fokker survives, wins! Just don't be a chicken!
